text: Mahadev Ghurhu is a town in the Siddharth Nagar district in Basti division of the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is next to Nepal. Mahadev Ghurhu is from the state's capital city Lucknow. == Overview == The city Mahadev Ghurhu is from Itwa, from the Basti and from Gorakhpur. This village founded by Baba Gainlal Srivastav. The nearest railway station is Barhni which is from Mahadev Ghurhu. It is on the Gonda-gorakhpur loop line and is being converted into broad gauge line. Another railway station near to Mahadev Ghurhu is Basti, which is well connected to Delhi, Mumbai, Lucknow, Gorakhpur etc. ==References== Category:Towns in Uttar Pradesh
